spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is preserved, but structural errors exist: the front entrance is missing a door, and the balcony transition lacks the solid wall segment shown on the bottom left of the floor plan. Window placement in the bedroom is incorrectly extended into full-height glazing.

structural_fidelity.notes: Significant structural deviations: the Utility area wall is missing, merging it into the kitchen. The 'Toilet-1' entry door is placed on the side rather than facing the hallway as indicated. Hallucinated a full-height glass window in the bedroom where a standard window and wall section should exist.

furniture_mapping.notes: Excellent furniture mapping. The dining table, sofa orientation, rug, bed placement, and kitchen appliance layout closely follow the 2D reference, though the side-sofa from the plan is replaced with a desk in the 3D render.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High visual quality. Correct orthographic-style perspective, clean geometry, and lighting. Realistic material application for the marble floors and cabinetry.

detected_errors.description: Missing front entrance door and utility room partition wall.
Bathroom door misplaced to the side wall instead of the hallway-facing wall.
Kitchen sink and counter orientation flipped relative to the 2D layout.
Bedroom window proportion distorted into a full floor-to-ceiling glass panel.
Hallucinated desk in bedroom replacing the auxiliary sofa shown in the living room area of the plan.
